类的使用
org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.batch.BatchProperties

  • 使用BatchProperties的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.batch
    Auto-configuration for Spring Batch.

    • org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.batch中BatchProperties的使用

      参数类型为BatchProperties的org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.batch中的构造器 
      构造器和说明
      BasicBatchConfigurer(BatchProperties properties, DataSource dataSource, TransactionManagerCustomizers transactionManagerCustomizers)
      Create a new BasicBatchConfigurer instance.
      BatchAutoConfiguration(BatchProperties properties, org.springframework.beans.factory.ObjectProvider<org.springframework.batch.core.converter.JobParametersConverter> jobParametersConverter) 
      BatchDatabaseInitializer(DataSource dataSource, org.springframework.core.io.ResourceLoader resourceLoader, BatchProperties properties) 
      JpaBatchConfigurer(BatchProperties properties, DataSource dataSource, TransactionManagerCustomizers transactionManagerCustomizers, EntityManagerFactory entityManagerFactory)
      Create a new BasicBatchConfigurer instance.
